mema aramudal aarambhaye sitama pradeshiya lekam kottasa mattamen pihituwa samruddhi maha sangam, samaja sanwardhana padanama wetha bara kere, ema aramudal mul karagena shri lanka samruddhi adhikariya pradeshiya lekam kottasa mattamin samaja subasadhana katayuthu, niwasa wadasatahan, sisudiriya shishyathwa wani wadasatahan kriyathmaka kara atha. 2012.06.01 sita 2013.02.28 dakwa da ru, 144,846,519.00 ka mulya pragathiyak samaja sanwardhana padanama haraha kriyathmaka karana lada wadasatahan walin pennum kara atha.

kolambaa beba‡∑≤k pedese pihiti maharaja aayathanaya idiriye udghoshana wyaparayak pawathwa ema aayathanaye sewakayanata paharadi depalawalata alabha kirime siddhiyata sambandha bawata nam anawaranaya wana anekuth sakakaruwan waha athadanguwata gena adhikaranayata idiripath karannayi kolambaa kotuwa mahesthrath lanka jayarathna menewiya kompanynyawidiya polisiyata eeye (19) niyoga kalaya.siddhiya sambandhayen kompanynyawidiya polisiya wisin athadanguwata gath sakakaruwan 17 deneku danata apa matha mudahara sitithi.siddhiya wu awasthawe patigatha kala widiyo darshana ha chayarupawalin handunagena athi thawath sakakaruwan 15 denekuge nam maharaja aayathanaya wisin kompanynyawidiya polisiya wetha bhara di thibuni.ema nam sandahan pudgalayan athadanguwata ganimata parikshana sidukala bawath atham pudgalayan adala lipinayanhi nomathi bawa ha atham nam sandahan pudgalayanda nowana bawa kompanynyawidiya polisiya mahesthrathwariyata eeye (19) danwiya.apa matha mudahara sitina sakakaruwan 17 denagen eeye (19) adhikaranayata nopamini sakakaruwan dedenekuta warenthu nikuth kala mahesthrathwariya nam gam sandahan wana anekuth sakakaruwan waha athadanguwata ganimata niyoga kalaya.siddhiya pilibandawa sidukala wimarshanaye udhrutha nithipathiwaraya wetha yomu kara awashya upades labagena sakakaruwanata wiruddhawa idiri dinayedi nadu pawarimata katayuthu karana lesada mahesthrathwariya kompanynyawidiya polisiyata eeye (19) thawaduratath niyoga kalaya.pasugiya marthu masa 22 wani dina sawasa siyayakata aasanna pirisak kompanynyawidiya beba‡∑≤k widiye pihiti maharaja aayathanaya idiriyata ras wi kako gasamin winashakari lesa hasiremin galmul ha poluwalin aayathanaya desata prahara ella kara thibuni.
